thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 30 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cpi Property Group SA -Reports Record Financial Results For 2017 Financial Year​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cpi Property Group SA -Reports Record Financial Results For 2017 Financial Year​
text:
March 30 (Reuters) - Cpi Property Group Sa:
* ‍REPORTS RECORD FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR 2017 FINANCIAL YEAR​
* ‍TOTAL ASSETS OF EUR 7.5 BILLION IN 2017, AN INCREASE OF EUR 1.9 BILLION FROM 2016​
* FY ‍TOTAL REVENUES ROSE EUR 87 MILLION TO EUR 438 MILLION, AND EPRA NAV GREW 44% TO EUR 3.9 BILLION​
* CPI PROPERTY GROUP - FY ‍OPERATING RESULT OVER EUR 1 BILLION, REFLECTING COMBINED EFFECTS OF HIGHER NET BUSINESS INCOME OF EUR 272 MILLION
* FY ‍NET RENTAL INCOME INCREASED BY 12% TO EUR 232 MILLION COMPARED TO EUR 207 MILLION IN 2016​
* CPI PROPERTY GROUP -FY ‍INCREASE IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE BY EUR 63 MILLION REFLECTS PRIMARILY DEFERRED TAX EFFECT OF PROPERTY PORTFOLIO REVALUATION​
* ‍TOTAL EQUITY INCREASED BY 45%, FROM EUR 2,289 MILLION AS AT 31 DEC 2016 TO EUR 3,315 MILLION AS AT 31 DECEMBER 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
